description: Cold breeze yields little damage.
Feeble and poorly directed. Foe is not really concerned.
Foe dodges your attack with too much effort. You have initiative.
Foe is fearful of your assault. Your attack gives you the initiative.
Burst of cold to the face sends foe stumbling back. You have initiative for 2 rounds.
Your attack freezes one of foe's metal items. Foe takes a defensive stance.
Scatter your attack all over foe's chest. Foe is covered with frost. He looks ghoulish.
Blow to foe's chest. Your attack has force and foe stumbles.
Strike falls on an exposed area. Foe gives ground. He is shaken but his guard is still up.
Well placed. Strike slams into foe's weapon arm. Foe's evasion is comical.
Steal the heat from foe's neck and chest area. Foe drops anything he is holding and blocks his throat.
Score a hit to foe's side. It produces mild frostbite. Any herbs on foe's belt are ruined.
Strong unbalancing blast. Foe's body temperature drops.
Strike to foe's shield arm. If foe sees it he may block with a shield. Foe recoils 5 feet from the blast.
Back blast. Any glass on back is broken. Painful bruise.
Assault to foe's lower leg freezes part of it. Foe falls down. Without leg armor, foot must be amputated.
Blow lands on foe's face. It freezes his nose, ears and cheeks. Foe collapses. Without helm, foe loses both ears.
Chest strike sends foe over hard. He is knocked out. His lips freeze and split open. He cannot speak for 2 weeks.
Foe is sent into a month long coma by the attack. He loses his nose to frostbite.
Attack yields a brief climate change.
Burst of cold causes target mild discomfort.
Foe evades frantically. He is still chilled. You have initiative next round.
Assault blinds foe for a moment. You have 2 rounds of initiative.
Frost laden blast forces foe back. Any containers of water freeze and burst open. You have 2 rounds of initiative.
Foe makes a futile attempt to parry the attack;. He loses 3 rounds of initiative.
Cold penetrates foe's chest and gives him frostbite. The pain must be severe. He stumbles back.
Strong off-center blast takes foe in his shield arm wrist and side.
Foe turns to avoid your attack and exposes his back. All wood on his back becomes frozen and brittle.
Solid strike to foe's forearm. Foe's hand frozen shut for 1 round.
Foe is covered by the blast. All extremities are damaged. The pain grows until foe is warmed up.
Spray foe's face with a powerful chill. He tries without success to push your attack away . The damage endures.
Strike lands on foe's legs. The pain and shock cause him to falter.
Chest strike freezes what it touches. Equipment is damaged. The pain persists. Chest armor is destroyed.
Clean hard strike pushes foe over, cracking ribs. His recovery lacks grace.
Strike lower leg and freeze it. With leg armor, he needs aid in 20 rnds to keep the foot. Without leg armor, it's gone.
Connect with foe's hip. Hip is fractured. Skin and muscles are frostbitten. Foe falls down. He is almost helpless.
Blast foe's neck and collarbone. Neck armor will block the attack, but foe is knocked out. If the neck is exposed it freezes solid and foe dies in 9 rounds.
Assault drops foe's body temperature; his heart stops. He dies in 1 round; well preserved. You are respected by all.
You give foe's cheeks a rosy hue.
Your attack conjures a bitter arctic wind. Foe is not impressed.
Encrust foe with ice. He is unbalanced as he shakes it off. You gain initiative.
Numbing whirlwind encircles foe. You have 2 rounds of initiative.
Disorient foe with a tricky shot. His garments have failed to keep out the chill. Press him while you can.
Catch foe in lower leg. You gain initiative while foe regains footing.
Blast hits foe's chest and scatters. The cold stings all exposed skin. Foe has a shocked look on his face.
Hard strike to chest, armor does not help. Blow leaves its frigid mark
Strong blast hits foe low. His legs almost give with the pain. Foe recoils 5 feet away from your assault.
Blast freeze dries organic material on foe's back.
Foe's response to your burst of cold sends him to the ground hard. Foe jams his wrist into the ground.
Freeze foe's weapon arm. It is useless until it is warmed up. Foe is in great pain and stuggles to stand.
Side strike hits foe just right. Any leather or cloth freezes and shatters.
Blow to foe's arms. Any metal armguards freeze, immobilizing arms until the armor is removed or unfrozen.
Arctic blast to foe's torso. Foe is badly frostbitten and falls to knees in pain.
Blow to foe's knees. They freeze up and foe falls. On impact, foe shatters a knee. His fall makes it twice as bad.
Freeze the blood in foe's thigh. As it warms the clots move to his heart killing him in 9 rounds.
Your onslaught freezes foe's torso and head. Foe remains standing for a moment. He goes into shock and dies 6 rounds later.
Blast freezes foe's eyes, mouth, and neck. Foe falls down in a coma for 2 weeks and paralyzed from neck down.
Your blast looks good, works poorly.
Foe shields himself. Your attack misses most of its mark.
Light frosting leaves foe unsteady. You must hit him again.
Foe's attempts to evade and strikes himself. You try not to laugh.
With a burst of white, you shower foe with ice crystals. Foe closes his eyes to avoid the onslaught.
Foe ices down; freezing any exposed skin. The pain is great.
Assault lands on foe's weapon arm. He makes a supreme effort to pull his arm away. Foe is unable to protect himself.
Heavy blow to shield shoulder. Foe is knocked back 5 feet. Muscle damage.
Miss foe's arm and strike his thigh. He loses his footing. Skin and nerve damage causes foe pain.
Blast freezes foe's arm and shield. If no shield,arm useless from nerve damage.
Frigid onslaught fills foes eyes and mouth with ice. Foe is blinded for a moment until he can clear his eyes.
Polar wind pierces deep into chest and leaves foe trembling. You are close to victory. Foe faces the wrong way.
Blast drains the heat from foe's weapon arm. Hand and arm are useless. The hand is frozen closed.
Strike to foe's side downs him. Severe frostbite hampers movements. Any liquid among foe's equipment freezes.
Freezes foe's hands. Arms are useless. Foe drops what he was carrying.
Chest hit causes much pain. If foe is warmly clothed he is knocked out. If not he dies of shock in 12 rounds.
All warmth is driven from foe's lower body. Vital organs are destroyed. Foe is immobile, and dies in 9 rounds.
Foe's heart and lungs are suddenly frozen by your arctic blast. Foe is finished. He dies of shock and suffocation in 6 rounds.
Massive assault freezes foe's body completely. He remains standing, but if knocked over he will shatter.
Sharp and cold air assaults foe's skin.
Ice up the ground and foe's feet. He springs clear. You have initiative.
Frigid strike to foe's torso and face. You have the initiative.
Foe's failed efforts to avoid your attack puts him at a grave disadvantage.
Freeze foe's hair and scalp. If foe has long hair, it breaks off! Foe struggles in vain to repair the damage.
Assault to foe's legs. Hypothermic, he struggles to remain standing.
Glancing strike to lower back. Foe is spun about and slings his weapon away. You have him now.
Blow to side. Foe seeks to regain his wind and survive your next onslaught.
Your blast engulfs foe's weapon arm and climbs toward his torso. He steps away frantic to evade the pain.
Strike to foe's waist. All equipment on belt freezes and breaks if foe moves.
Your strike steals the heat out of foe's neck and upper chest. Nerves and muscles are damaged.
Blow to foe's shield arm. He is knocked down. If foe has a shield, it is broken. If not, the arm is broken.
Blast freezes weapon hand, shoulder and face. Foe is numb and needs time to warm up. Foe is still standing.
Solid chest strike. Foe flips onto his back , dropping all he holds. Foe is at your mercy.
Assault to throat and face is terminal. Foe is still active but dies in 12 rounds.
Your ruthless tempest entangles foe and steals the warmth from his body. He drops and dies in 9 inactive rounds.
Push foe backwards and off balance. The blood in foe's extremeties is frozen. He dies in 6 rounds of agony.
Foe is a lifeless frozen statue. He is quite dead and well preserved. Store in a cool dry place.
Foe freezes solid and shatters into a thousand pieces. Most land within 20 feet from where he was standing.
